dct_title_s: Sketch map of the Saugor division and adjoining countries : compiled from available materials in the office of the Surveyor General of India, August 1855
dct_description_sm: Compiled under the superintendence of m. John Graham assist. surv., drawn & printed by J.H. Poulson, Aboos Sobhan, Abdul Kadar, & Abdul Ruhman draftsmen. Lith by H.M. Smith at the Surv. Genl Office, Calcutta, Nov. 1855.
